  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205300</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Romania, My Old Haunts</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rumänien, Meine Alten Lieblingsplätze</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Roumanie, Mes Vieilles Retraites</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Romania, Meus Haunts Velhos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Romania, Le Mie Vecchie Tane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η Ρουμανία, παλαιός μου συχνάζει</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Rumania, Mis Viejos Refugios</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this interactive and multi-disciplinary lesson, students learn the role that perspective plays as Andrei Codrescu returns to Romania 13 years after his escape and seeks out a fellow poet-Mircea Dinescu-who became a symbol of the revolution.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser interaktiven und multidisziplinären 
Lektion erlernen Kursteilnehmer die Rolle, die Perspektive spielt, 
während Andrei Codrescu nach Rumänien 13 Jahre nachdem sein 
Entweichen zurückgeht und einen Gefährtedichter-Mircea aussucht, 
Dinescu-der ein Symbol der Umdrehung wurde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon interactive et 
multidisciplinaire, les étudiants apprennent le rôle que la 
perspective joue pendant qu'andrei Codrescu revient à la Roumanie 13 
ans après que son évasion et cherche un poèt-Mircea de camarade 
Dinescu-qui est devenu un symbole de la révolution.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição interativa e multi-disciplinary, os 
estudantes aprendem o papel que o perspective joga enquanto Andrei 
Codrescu retorna a Romania 13 anos depois que seu escape e procura 
para fora um poeta-Mircea do companheiro Dinescu-que se transforme um 
símbolo da volta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione interattiva e pluridisciplinare,
gli allievi imparano il ruolo che la prospettiva svolge mentre Andrei 
Codrescu ritorna in Romania 13 anni dopo che la sua fuga e cerca un 
poet-Mircea-Mircea del collega Dinescu-che si è transformato in in un
simbolo della rivoluzione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το διαλογικό και διεπιστημονικό μάθημα, οι 
σπουδαστές μαθαίνουν το ρόλο που εκείνη η προοπτική 
διαδραματίζει ως επιστροφές Andrei Codrescu στη Ρουμανία 
13 έτη μετά από τη διαφυγή του και αναζητά ένα συντροφικό 
ποιητής- mircea δηνεσθu-που έγινε ένα σύμβολο της επανάστασης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta lección interactiva y multidisciplinaria,
los estudiantes aprenden el papel que la perspectiva desempeña 
mientras que Andrei Codrescu vuelve a Rumania 13 años después de que
su escape y busca a poeta-Mircea del compañero Dinescu-que hizo un 
símbolo de la revolución.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

  </description>
